zero_arg.prune_images: Deletes unused images to free up space.

one_arg.user: Manages user accounts in the system.
one_arg.compute: Manages compute resources and their allocation.
one_arg.acl: Manages access control lists for resources.
one_arg.group: Manages user groups in the system.
one_arg.pool: Manages resource pools for efficient usage.

two_arg.pool_resource: Assigns resources to a specific pool.
two_arg.node: Manages physical or virtual nodes in the system.
two_arg.drawing: Creates or manages drawings/diagrams of resources.
two_arg.user_from_group: Manages users within a specific group.
two_arg.snapshot: Creates or manages snapshots of resources.
